item.title: Amelia add a quote by Rosalind Russell (Auntie Mame)
item.description: "Life is a banquet, and most poor suckers are starving to death!" -- Rosalind Russell (Auntie Mame)

item.title: Amelia add a quote by Edgar Degas
item.description: "Art is not what you see, but what you make others see." -- Edgar Degas

item.title: Amelia add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep." -- Scott Adams

item.title: Amelia add a quote by Toni Morrison
item.description: "Like any artist without an art form, she became dangerous." -- Toni Morrison

item.title: Amelia add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Down on the lake rosy reflections of celestial vapor appeared, and I said, "God, I love you" and looked to the sky and really meant it. "I have fallen in love with you, God. Take care of us all, one way or the other." To the children and the innocent it's all the same." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Amelia add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our scientific power has outrun our spiritual power. We have guided missiles and misguided men." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Amelia add a quote by Krishnamurti
item.description: "do it or don't do it but get on with it..." -- Krishnamurti

item.title: Amelia add a quote by Ann Richards
item.description: "After all, Ginger Rogers did everything that Fred Astaire did. She just did it backwards and in high heels." -- Ann Richards

item.title: Amelia add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "If there are no dogs in Heaven, then when I die I want to go where they went." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Amelia add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "Half our life is spent trying to find something to do with the time we have rushed through life trying to save." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Amelia add a quote by Roger Babson
item.description: "It is wise to keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final." -- Roger Babson
